title: Deathrecap....
body:
what part of fizz's seastone trident has any form of cc in it??
how is it a status effect? 
furthermore he hit me with his Q which isn't even on the recap..

the recap is literally making it up as it goes along...

replies.body: doesnt that make it damage not cc?
its a burn/grievous wounds. increased burn/loss of health with more missing health
doesn't have greivous wounds on it anymore
